CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Weather Impacts relative to Political Disruptions?
SRP.A: Weather Impacts is {above} Political Disruptions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Political Disruptions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Weather Impacts}.

VE.Q: What is Political Disruptions's Cross-Border Delays in 1981?
VE.A: Political Disruptions's cross-border delays in 1981 is {17.43} hours.

VE.Q: What is Political Disruptions's Cross-Border Delays in 1986?
VE.A: Political Disruptions's cross-border delays in 1986 is {20.57} hours.

VE.Q: What is Weather Impacts's Cross-Border Delays in 1973?
VE.A: Weather Impacts's cross-border delays in 1973 is {11.33} hours.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Cross-Border Delays in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum cross-border delays is {5.73} hours.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Cross-Border Delays in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum cross-border delays is {22.40} hours.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Cross-Border Delays level recorded for Political Disruptions?
EVJ.A: Political Disruptions reached approximately {22.40} hours in {1989}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Cross-Border Delays level recorded for Political Disruptions?
EVJ.A: Political Disruptions's lowest recorded level is approximately {11.43} hours in {1972}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Cross-Border Delays?
SC.A: The average total cross-border delays is {25.70} hours.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cross-Border Delays fall between 24.35 and 26.92 hours? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cross-Border Delays exceed 26.52 hours? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cross-Border Delays go below 24.75 hours? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Cross-Border Delays in 1982 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The total cross-border delays in 1982 was {lower} than in 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1981, did the total Cross-Border Delays experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total cross-border delays between 1980 and 1981 was {larger} than between 1981 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1978, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1973 and 1986?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between 1972 and 1978 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1986.

NC.Q: Was the total Cross-Border Delays in 1972 higher or lower than in 1982?
NC.A: The total cross-border delays in 1972 was {lower} than in 1982.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Political Disruptions} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Weather Impacts, Political Disruptions}.
